documentation.content:
## Example AST Structure from bash-parser (JavaScript)

```js
{
		type: "Script",
		commands: [
			{
				type: "SimpleCommand",
				name: {
					text: "echo",
					type: "Word"
				},
				suffix: [
					{
						text: "ciao",
						type: "Word"
					}
				]
			}
		]
	}
```

## Defining ArithmeticExpansion AST Node (JavaScript)

```js
{ type: 'ArithmeticExpansion',
	expression: string,
	resolved: boolean,
	arithmeticAST: Object,
	loc: {
		start:Number,
		end:Number
	}
}
```

## Defining CaseItem AST Node (JavaScript)

```js
{ type: 'CaseItem',
	pattern: Array<Word>,
	body: CompoundList
}
```

## Defining ParameterExpansion AST Node (JavaScript)

```js
{ type: 'ParameterExpansion',
	parameter: string,
	kind: ?string,
	word: ?string,
	op: ?string,
	loc: {
		start:Number,
		end:Number
	}
}
```

## Defining While Statement AST Node (JavaScript)

```js
{ type: 'While',
	clause: CompoundList,
	do: CompoundList
}
```

## Defining the Case Statement AST Node in JavaScript

```JavaScript
{
	type: 'Case',
	clause: Word,
	cases: Array<CaseItem>
}
```

## Defining CommandExpansion AST Node (JavaScript)

```js
{ type: 'CommandExpansion',
	command: string,
	resolved: boolean,
	commandAST: Object,

	loc: {
		start:Number,
		end:Number
	}
}
```

## Defining the LogicalExpression AST Node in JavaScript

```JavaScript
{
	type: 'LogicalExpression',
	op: string,
	left: LogicalExpression |
		  Pipeline |
		  Command |
		  Function |
		  Subshell |
		  For |
		  Case |
		  If |
		  While |
		  Until,
	right: LogicalExpression |
		   Pipeline |
		   Command |
		   Function |
		   Subshell |
		   For |
		   Case |
		   If |
		   While |
		   Until
}
```

## Defining If Statement AST Node (JavaScript)

```js
{ type: 'If',
	clause: CompoundList,
	then: CompoundList,
	else: CompoundList
}
```

## Parsing a Bash Command with bash-parser (JavaScript)

```js
  const parse = require('bash-parser');
  const ast = parse('echo ciao');
```
